response.overview: A mother's greatest fear is to get a visit from police officers with news of the murder of her child... that fear becomes the worst nightmare of her life when justice for her child slowly becomes unattainable; it's that nightmare that pushes Marsha Thompson to seek God for His divine favor in bringing the men who hunted down her 17-year-old son and killed him for jogging in the wrong neighborhood, to justice.
response.title: Redwood
